agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Energy Resources TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, April 8, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Chris Paddie HB 509 Wilson | et al. Relating to the regulation of aggregate production operations by the Railroad Commission of Texas; authorizing a fee; providing administrative penalties and other civil remedies; creating criminal offenses. HB 864 Anchia | et al. Relating to pipeline incident reporting requirements for gas pipeline operators; clarifying changes to related administrative penalties. HB 866 Anchia | et al. Relating to the replacement of certain gas pipelines with plastic pipelines; clarifying changes to related administrative penalties. HB 868 Anchia | et al. Relating to gas pipeline operator disclosure of the location of pipeline leaks; clarifying changes to related administrative penalties. HB 2498 Paddie Relating to the procedure for acting on an application for a permit for a surface coal mining and reclamation operation. HB 2606 King, Ken Relating to complaints about rates charged by certain pipeline operators. HB 2871 Biedermann Relating to the regulation of certain aggregate production operations by the Railroad Commission of Texas; authorizing a fee; providing administrative penalties and other civil remedies; creating criminal offenses. HB 2920 Turner, Chris Relating to the requirement of a public hearing on certain applications for a permit to drill an oil or gas well. HB 3673 Capriglione Relating to the application of the Underground Facility Damage Prevention and Safety Act to Class B underground facilities. HB 4060 Zwiener Relating to a program administered by the Railroad Commission of Texas to provide grants to promote pipeline emergency preparedness; authorizing a fee. HB 4380 Herrero Relating to the creation of the Environmental Task Force Advisory Committee. HB 4423 Zwiener Relating to surface remediation and the restoration of land disturbed by the installation of a pipeline. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
